behavior.name: sub-task-tracking
behavior.summary: How sub-tasks are tracked as comments on beads tickets. Sub-tasks are NOT separate tickets — they are tracked as structured comments on the parent ticket.

section.name: rules
section.rule: After plan approval, the orchestrator posts the approved sub-task list as a comment on the ticket: bd comment {ticket-id} "Sub-tasks: ..."
Sub-task updates are posted as new comments on the ticket, not edits to existing comments. This preserves a timeline of progress.
